name: The Game of Setanta
description:
You are imprisoned in an attic and need to find your way out into the summer sun, but your attempt to unlock the door lands you in a surreal predicament. A puzzle-heavy, fantasy text adventure. Two possible endings.

Can also be played online here.

For those unfamiliar with the medium, it can be solved by using the following verbs: TAKE, OPEN, DROP, PUT [thing] IN [thing], TALK TO [person], HIT [thing] WITH [thing], ENTER, EXIT, PUSH, plus compass directions,

Walkthrough here.

Cover image in the public domain, from Eleanor Hull's The Boy's Cuchulain.
